body.name: ADORNEVE Full Size Platform Bed Frame with Outlet, USB Ports and Storage Headboard, Upholstered Bed with LED Lights, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Dark Grey
features: 【Individualized & Modern Style】-Classic neutral linen fabric & rustic burnt cloud wood plank combine, Unique design will bring a warm feeling to your bedrooms or guest rooms. This modern bed frame features a show-stopping LED light Perfect for modern bedrooms, The led lights are a perfect touch for modernizing your room.

【LED Bed Frame】-The Bed with multifunctional LED light strips ,beautiful Multi-colour RGB LED Light(There are over 60000 colors to choose from), Phone App +Remote Control multiple control modes. You can freely set the brightness,color,mode and timing function,and design your light show to your heart's content. with RGB LED Lights Beds Makes Your Life Smarter，more suitable for your needs.

【Storage Headboard with Charging Station】-Built in 2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports , Storage headboard place common small items such as phones, books within easy reach, i The bookcase storage headboard also can be opened, providing you with a hidden storage space, It is very convenient and practical. in addition, There are also small storage bags on both sides of the head of the bed, and the remote control, headphones and glasses can be placed easily.

【Sturty & Durable Structure】-The upholstered platform bed is made of heavy duty wood construction, center support legs blend naturally into the sturdy frame to provide dense and strong support. The bed frame provides your family with a safe and comfortable sleep environment.

【Easy Assembly 】 -Each part of the bed full is clearly labeled and numbered on each and you just need to match those numbers in order to assemble. Bed in a box, don’t have to worry or wait for the second box.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Let's know about this wonderful LED bed frame with Storage Headboard
Adjustable Bookcase Headboard & Charging Station & LED Lights

Smart RGB LED Lights over 60,000 colors to choose and multiple modes with LED lights, with a variety of colors and modes to choose from, it can be operated with the remote control and mobile app. Intelligent music synchronization function, while playing music, the LED light color and flashing mode will change with the music rhythm, full of fun.
Each of our beds is dedicated to provide a better sleep, just to satisfy you.

Specifications Color Dark Grey Size Full/Queen Material Solid Wood & Linen Fabric & Metal Weight Capacity 880LBS Feature A Storage Headboard with Led Lights & Power Oultets Feature B Under Bed Storage Space & Strong Wood Slats Assembly Required Yes, Easy Box Spring Required No

Color changing light strip Makes Your Life Smarter Adjustable Storage Bookcase Headboard & 2 Small Storage bags 13 Sturdy Wood Slats, 2 Metal Supports, and 9 Support Legs provide strong support easily up to 880 LBS! Under Bed 6“ Storage Space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product overall
reviews.reviewText: This headboard and bed frame is amazing! Pretty easy to build took about 30ish minutes myself. Love the slats being velcro instead of nailing them in. The lights are a sleek touch and the hidden shelving is good for extra items. Only problem I have is the plugs are hard to take chargers out of, I really have to yank them hard every time. Other than that, amazing buy and highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, cool bed for teenager
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bed for my daughter. She loves the LED lights that it came with. I like the hidden compartment for her to store some of her items and to reduce clutter. It was very easy to assemble, she is 13 and she assisted me. Seems to be very sturdy. Overall, we are very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but...
reviews.reviewText: I wish I could give this 4.5 stars. I really like it. It looks nice, it's sturdy, fairly easy to put together, but are the upholstery fumes slowly poisoning me in my sleep? Not sure. What I do know is that when I pulled it out of the box it made me sneeze a lot (I have a super sensitive nose though) and even after 3 weeks, I can still smell it. It's definitely dissipating, but my super nose can still detect it. Here's some other points...Fairly easy to put together but be careful not to strip the allen wrenchThe LED lights are awesome! The sticky that holds them up not so awesome, it keeps coming down in one corner. But I love the lights, it has an app and you can program them to any color as well as auto turn off/on. I haven't tried the feature where they react to your musicMy cats have only tried to claw it twice, so far so good...It's short, if you are going from a bed frame with a box spring to just this and a mattress, you will notice a difference, but it's not horribleWhy is the cord for the LED lights 5 miles long while the plug in for the outlet way too short??The shelf is not as wide as I thought it would be, but it will fit my phone and a book, although the book hangs over the edge a bitAside from the fumes, I'm glad I got it and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice bed perfect size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love it and was easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good for the price my son loves this bed because it has storage to put books in plus he likes the lights. Easy to put together took about 20-30 minutes it comes with everything you need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking bed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bed for my teenager. It was actually pretty easy to put together. One person can do it alone but it is easier to have a helping hand on the headboard. It took me about and hour and a half to put together. The lights are a cool feature. Seems to be sturdy and well built from what I can tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bed for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We needed to upgrade my son's loft bed with something more grown up. We upgraded to a full size mattress with this bed frame and it was a nice choice. Easy to assemble. Lights and outlets are cool in the headboard. My son expected the storage to be a little bigger/deeper, but it's still nice to have a little hiding spot. He decided the bed needed more LED's so he ran a strip under the frame of the bed and it looks pretty cool now.
